tomorrow.translation[0].definitions[0].d: on or during the day after today
tomorrow.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Our class is going to London tomorrow.
Terry’s new job starts a week tomorrow.
tomorrow.translation[1].definitions[0].e: I’ll see you at tomorrow’s meeting.
tomorrow.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the future, especially the near future
tomorrow.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The computers of tomorrow will be smaller and more powerful.
